resources.string: Very Weak - Might keep out family members.
Weak - Usually good enough for computer login passwords and to keep out the average person.
Good - This password is fairly secure cryptographically and skilled hackers may need some good computing power to crack it.
Strong - This password is typically good enough to safely guard sensitive information like financial records.
• should not contain your user name, real name, or company name.
• should have upper case, lower case, symbols, and numbers. Or at least three of those.
• should not be a common word and not be a common phrase.
This app could easily stealing your password. It\'s not, it runs only on your device and doesn\'t send or store data. Anyway be careful where you type your password in.
•Is a series of words that create a phrase.
•Does not contain common phrases found in literature or music
•Does not contain words found in the dictionary.
•Does not contain your user name, real name, or company name.
•Is significantly different from previous passwords or passphrases.
